New Records: Sadeera Samarawickrama hit his maiden World Cup hundred.
Kusal Mendis scored Sri Lanka's fastest-ever hundred in men's World Cup history, reaching the milestone in just 65 deliveries.
Key Match Events: Sadeera Samarawickrama reached his hundred off 82 balls vs Pakistan.
Kusal Mendis played a 122-run knock vs Pakistan.
Sadeera Samarawickrama shared a century stand with Kusal Mendis.
Kusal Mendis hammered Shaheen Afridi and the others for a stunning innings at No. 3, hitting 14 fours and six sixes.
